name: Lawn 64
description:
Made in 14 days for the LOWREZJAM 2022. This Jam imposed the limitation that your game had to be 64x64!

Mow as many lawns as you can, but beware of snakes (-500 points!) and an empty gas tank!

Controls - Arrows/WASD:Move | M:ToggleMusic | N:ToggleSound | B:ToggleScreenshake

Dev's Note: I ran out of momentum for this one, but wanted to get something in the jam. The hardest part of the 64x64 limitation for me was how little text you can fit on the screen.

Thanks to Em and Cassidy for playtesting, and to everyone who gives the game a try :)
